title: The Hidden Secret of Dongaraji Temple

infobox.Title:: The Hidden Secret of Dongaraji Temple
infobox.Japanese title:: 曇柄寺が隠す秘密  (Dongaraji ga Kakusu Himitsu)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba
infobox.Animation director:: Masatomo Sudo and Seiji Muta (supervisors)  Yui Ushinohama, Miho Tanaka (asst.), Chie Morishita (asst.), and Nozomi Sakamoto (asst.)
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Nobuyuki Iwai  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Yosuke Akimoto as Ryozen Adachi  Goro Sanada as Eisaku Toratani  Sayuri Yoshida as Housewife A  Hiromi Ishikawa as Housewife B  Junko Asami as Housewife C  Jun Inoue as Man  Tomokazu Sugita as Kinta Toratani  Daisuke Ono as Ginsuke Toratani
infobox.Opening song:: Sekai wa Anata no Iro ni Naru

sections.Situation:
Detective Takagi and Chiba are investigating the robbery happened in Beika namely Takashi Shishido (a robber), stealing 30 million yen, but two hours ago, he died in a car accident. But the 30 million yen he stole was not yet found. Conan and Kogoro are happened to be each other and is running towards at Dongaraji Temple. So he followed him.

He died after escaping.

Ryozen Adachi, the head priest, is hiring Kogoro to investigate the threat. Conan, who had been wandering at the city, he heard two women talking that a single person appeared one at a time. Conan said it is a interesting conversation, but the woman said that there is no interesting about it. The woman said that Toratani Eisuke, father of Ginsuke and Kinta Toratani, meets the two women at one time. The woman said that he was at Nishiguchi Park, so he said that they mistook for Eisuke Toratani.

Kogoro, who had also been investigating about the threat. The woman said that the two men were flustered when the construction is all about to began. So the two men made the phone threat. Kogoro meets Ginsuke and Kinta Toratani (sons of Eisuke Toratani), so they are wandering that why the detective is here. Kogoro and Conan are highly suspicious about them.Kogoro, back again to the two brothers saying that they killed his own father to get his pension, and they buried the body at Dongaraji Temple. And they found out that HE IS ALIVE! Also they are investigating again, Ginsuke and Kinta Toratani's father had Dementia. So he said that he found a man burying at Dongaraji Temple. But who did really send the threat at Dongaraji Temple, was it the two brothers or his father?

sections.Trivia: - The episode had the provisional title The Suspicious Family of Three (疑惑の三人家族 ,Giwaku no San'nin Kazoku?) in the June 2016 TV magazine released in May 2016, while the Detective Conan DVD collection volume 5 had the episode with the provisional title of The Hidden Secret of Beikokuji Temple (米国寺が隠す秘密 ,Beikoku-ji ga Kakusu Himitsu?)[1].
